query_original: Compute a geometry relaxation for UiO-66 using an ML interatomic potential. Use fmax 0.05 eV/Å and max 500 steps. Return a JSON experiment spec for SevenNet.
query_canonical: Perform a geometry relaxation of the UiO-66 metal-organic framework using a machine learning interatomic potential. Use a force convergence criterion (fmax) of 0.05 eV/Å and a maximum of 500 optimization steps. Provide the experiment specification in JSON format compatible with the SevenNet MLIP platform.
notes: Geometry relaxation of UiO-66 MOF using SevenNet MLIP with fmax=0.05 eV/Å and max 500 steps. Placeholder structure path used.
